[ [Main Docs](?qid=ad1019a3-30d8-413c-9c5e-b0b2d7d9a560) -> Metadata Sources ] 

# Metadata Sources

Metadata sources are used to create dynamic Jinja variable input for Jinja templates. These can be leveraged in the following records:
 - ZTP Profile Assignment Search Type = Jinja
 - Metfield Templates
 - Script Templates

# Metadata Source Types
Metadata source types describe how we can retrieve data to be used in a jinja template. 

 - fmg 
 - playbook 

Metadata sources can contain multiple sources and be mixed of API and Playbooks. 

## Metadata Source Type: fmg

### Schema
```
[
  {
    "source_type": "fmg",
    "source": "<fmg connector config_name>",
    "keyname": "<attribute name for data>",
    "location": "<api url>"
  }
]
```

### Example
```
[
  {
    "source_type": "fmg",
    "source": "\{\{record.connector_config\}\}",
    "keyname": "interfaces",
    "location": "/pm/config/device/\{\{record.devname\}\}/global/system/interface"
  }
]
```

## Metadata Source Type: playbook

### Schema

```
[
  {
    "source_type": "playbook",
    "keyname": "<attribute name for data>",
    "playbook_id": "<custom playbook id found in url of playbook>",
    "payload": "<input data for playbook>"
  }
]
```

### Example
```
[
  {
    "source_type": "playbook",
    "keyname": "ip_table",
    "playbook_id": "9e6cff1f-0fe3-4c85-bf25-5cb409cea778",
    "argument": ""
  },
  {
    "source_type": "playbook",
    "keyname": "ip_table_lookup",
    "playbook_id": "1c6e570a-605e-46ac-9125-32f2af1877e7",
    "argument": "{{record.devname}}"
  }
]
```
```
